question: 購入
sourceMnemonic: When your <kanji>subscription</kanji> <kanji>enter</kanji>s into effect, you have made your <vocabulary>purchase</vocabulary>. This one's a bit weird because it seems like it should refer to a subscription, but I guess it is a one time subscription, and your subscription lasts your whole life?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
